text.title: I am a web developer creating web applications on React. My main specialization is frontend development, but I can also work on backend or design databases.
text.text: Since 2017, I have been working as a middle management in the direct sales department. Around the same time, I started working as a freelancer developing sites from simple landing pages to complex web applications. I like to learn something new, discover new areas experience and put everything into practice.

skills.title: Skills & Experience
skills.textSkills: During all my work and studies time, I have developed certain skills and gained experience. My main area of expertise is frontend development with ReactJS. I also have experience in backend development and database design.
skills.listSkillsDescript: Some of the skills I developed during my studies and work
skills.listLanguageToolsDescript: Some computer languages and tools that I know.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.textContact: If you have a question or want to cooperate please contact me. Feel free to send an mail on ivanandrosc@gmail.com. Alternatively, you can also send a mail here!
contact.name: Name

intelecom.subtitle: Company website
intelecom.addText:
The task was the development of the company website that is pleasant for the user with a convenient dashboard for working with information.

Frontend: React + Redux

Backend: Express.js

Database: MongoDB + mongoose

bus.subtitle: Company website
bus.addText: The task was to create a site with a catalog of the company's products and a volume filter, a database of products obtained from 1С:Enterprise. To implement the task, a handler was created to export the database to XML format and then uploading it to the server. Please don't judge by design.
